creator: Kids Food Games Inc.
descriptionHtml:
From the creators of Unicorn Slime and Unicorn Chef, we bring you our newest game: Unicorn Slime Simulator.
This version is a realistic simulation game.

You can stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it, swirl it and poke it. Parents won't buy you a slime? No worries, this Unicorn Slime Simulator feels exactly like the real thing!

Features:
- Make slime in the mobile device anywhere, anytime. Just like playing the real slime!
- Make your own slime: Over 20 slime types, you can choose, such as putty, milky, glitter, jam, metallic. Tons of decorations especially with unicorn decorations for girls.
- Save every slime you've ever made and re-play them!
- The best anti stress: Unicorn + Slime = perfect anti stress game. Do you have stress at school? No worries ASMR + Unicorn + Slime will help you RELAX!

How to play:
- Make the slime step by step by following the instructions.
- Combine different colors, decorations, and texture types to make the slime that you like.
- We also have pre-made slime for you to play directly. Just press and play!

Crash, Freeze, Bugs, Comments, Feedback?
Feel free to drop us a line at https://www.kidsfoodinc.com/contact

Important Message for Purchases:
- By downloading this App you agree to Kids Food Games Inc's Privacy Policy.
- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.

About Kids Food Games
Kids Food Games is a high quality Educational Game Studio for Girls. Our goal is to bring fun, safe and exciting new educational gaming experiences to girls.

Important Message to Parents
This app is free to play and all content is FREE with ads. There are certain in-game features that may require purchase using real money.

Discover more free games with Kids Food Games Inc
- Subscribe to our youtube channel at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIBxt5W2xpgofE9jOS6fXqQ/featured
- Learn more about us at: https://www.kidsfoodinc.com/.
descriptionShort: Super Slime Simulator App Cute slimes such as unicorn, rainbow, glitter & more

We updated the app to fix some bugs.

Thanks for your feedbacks and reviews. If you have any idea or comment, please give us a review :)

title: Slime Games for Girls for Kids

creator: Kids Food Games Inc.
descriptionHtml:
From the creators of Unicorn Slime and Unicorn Chef, we bring you our newest game: Unicorn Slime Simulator.

Super antistress & realistic slime simulation game.

You can stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it, swirl it and poke it. Parents won't buy you a slime? No worries, this Unicorn Slime Simulator feels exactly like the real thing!

Features:
- Make slime in the mobile device anywhere, anytime. Just like playing the real slime!
- Make your own slime: Over 20 slime types, you can choose, such as putty, milky, glitter, jam, metallic. Tons of decorations especially with unicorn decorations.
- Save every slime you've ever made and re-play them!
- The best anti stress: Unicorn + Slime = perfect anti stress game. Do you have stress at school? No worries ASMR + Unicorn + Slime will help you RELAX!

How to play:
- Make the slime step by step by following the instructions.
- Combine different colors, decorations, and texture types to make the slime that you like.
- We also have pre-made slime for you to play directly. Just press and play!

Antistress, Relax, Stress Relief slime games!
descriptionShort: Super Slime Simulator Games for Teens. Antistress Slime Games for Fun
